answers.answer: Hi there,Losing weight needs lot of patience and determination.Midsectiion is the commonest area to gain weight. The ideal aim should be to lose about half kg per week or two kg in a month Diabetes mellitus, worm infestations and hyperthyroidism are other conditions which can make one hungry several times a day. If you have increased appetite you may need to discuss the above mentioned possibilities with your doctor. A. I suggest you to eat frequent small meals and eat lots of fruits and non-starchy green veggies, go slow on fats, eat carbohydrates in moderation and increase your protein intake. For weight loss burning more calories will result in weight loss. Physical activity is important for burning calories. Aerobic activities will have the greatest impact on calorie burning. Consider your choices based on your fitness level and your interests.Best luck and regards!
